entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Winchester
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:35 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain early this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
